title: Represent and analyze - 5 points on a v-t graph

content.question: An object is oscillating in simple harmonic motion. The graph shows the objectâ€™s velocity as a function of time, with five points on the graph indicated at the labeled times. At which of the following times is the object both accelerating in the positive direction and farther away from equilibrium than it is at time <math alttext="t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
